page_content: The page discusses digital culture projects supported by the Kanton Bern, but it is not focused on software or software guides.
The page discusses the increasing trend of filing tax returns online in the Kanton Bern and mentions the use of TaxMe-CD software for this purpose.
The page provides legal disclaimers and data protection information for the website of the Justice Department of the Kanton Bern.
The page discusses the impact of the Coronavirus crisis on tax returns and mentions the use of TaxMe-Online and TaxMe-Offline software for filing taxes.
The page discusses the implementation of the Vote électronique system for Swiss citizens abroad, mentioning that the system is based on Open-Source software.
The page focuses on the importance of springs as habitats and the work done by the Gewässer- und Bodenschutzlabor in the Kanton Bern to study them.
The page provides educational resources and guidelines for teaching German in the 2nd cycle, focusing on listening, speaking, and reading skills.
The page provides guidelines for remote teaching in the field of Technical and Textile Design, including the use of digital educational aids.
The page provides legal disclaimers and data protection information for the website of the Justice Department of the Kanton Bern.
The page provides instructions on how to use the Geoportal map application for ÖREB-Kataster topics in the Kanton Bern.
